enb_long_title: Fifth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Delegates adopted the recommendation for COP-5 to adopt the draft decision on the implementation of FCCC Articles 4.8 and 4.9 (Decision 3/CP.3 and Protocol Articles 2.3 and 3.14) and matters relating to Protocol Article 3.14 (FCCC/SB/1999/CRP.8).
